targets.name: RNScreens_common_cpp
targets.moduleMapContent:
module rnscreens {
  requires cplusplus

  // All headers are textual - they are not self-contained and cannot be precompiled independently.
  // They rely on JSI_EXPORT macro and other types being defined by including translation units.
  textual header "rnscreens/FrameCorrectionModes.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSBottomTabsAccessoryComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSBottomTabsAccessoryShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSBottomTabsAccessoryState.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSBottomTabsComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSBottomTabsShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSBottomTabsState.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSFullWindowOverlayComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSFullWindowOverlayShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSFullWindowOverlayState.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSModalScreenComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSModalScreenShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSSafeAreaViewComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSSafeAreaViewShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSSafeAreaViewState.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenStackHeaderConfigComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenStackHeaderConfigShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenStackHeaderConfigState.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenStackHeaderSubviewComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenStackHeaderSubviewShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenStackHeaderSubviewState.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSScreenState.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSSplitViewScreenComponentDescriptor.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSSplitViewScreenShadowNode.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/RNSSplitViewScreenState.h"
  textual header "rnscreens/utils/RectUtil.h"

  export *
}

targets.name: RNScreens_cpp
